entry.title: HALF SHELL FEATURES BLUEGRASS TUESDAY NIGHT
entry.summary: July 15, 2025 5:30 a.m. In the KQEN Cultural Spotlight: Music on the Half Shell features bluegrass music on Tuesday night at the Nichol’s Band Shell in Roseburg’s Stewart Park. entry.title: ABOVE NORMAL TEMPERATURES CONTINUE, TIE FOR RECORD HIGH LOW
entry.summary: July 15, 2025 4:10 a.m. Above normal temperatures continue through Friday in the Umpqua Valley. Forecasters at the National Weather Service in Medford told News Radio 93-9 FM and 1240 KQEN that the high reached 97 degrees Monday at the Roseburg Regional Airport. That tied June 7th as the third hottest day of the year...

entry.title: UMPQUA HEALTH ALLIANCE AWARDS OVER $507,000 TO FOUR LOCAL PROJECTS
entry.summary: July 15, 2025 3:30 a.m. Umpqua Health Alliance’s Community Advisory Council has awarded over $507,000 in funding to four community-led initiatives in Douglas County. A UHA release said the selected projects focus on expanding access to childcare, youth development, public recreation, and workforce education. entry.title: Plea deal reached in rape case
entry.summary: A Roseburg man who sexually assaulted a Roseburg middle school student is facing up to 25 years in prison after he accepted a plea deal in court Monday.
